text: Yoo Jeong-bok (; born 17 June 1957) is a South Korean politician who has served as the mayor of Incheon since 2022. A member of the People Power Party, Yoo previously held the office from 2014 to 2018. In April 2025, Yoo, a member of the People Power Party, announced his candidacy for President of South Korea in the 2025 snap presidential election. He lost the nomination the following month. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean politicians
title: Yoo Jeong-bok
